basic.description: This course focuses on active RF/microwave circuit design. Topics include two-port characterization of RF/microwave transistors; matching networks; RF/microwave transistor amplifier design using low-noise, high-gain, broadband and high-power design methods; and RF/microwave transistor oscillator design.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: RF/Microwave Circuits II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Graduate standing or instructor permission.
